s1618: Five. Qin pulled our Yi Yang, beheaded sixty thousand.
s1625: Qin Zhao Xiang Wang first year
s1626: Thirteen. Qin struck Pi Shi, not pulled then withdrew.
s1627: Six. Qin again gave us Wu Sui.
s1634: Two. Comet appeared. Sang Jun made disorder, executed.
s1635: Fourteen. Qin Wu Wang empress came back.
s1638: Twenty-four. Qin came to welcome woman.
s1647: Twenty-five. Met with Qin king at Huang Jiao, Qin again returned our Shang Yong.
s1653: Sixteen. Qin pulled our Pu Ban, Jin Yang, Feng Ling.
s1661: Five. Wei king came to court.
s1662: Seventeen. Met with Qin at Lin Jin, again returned our Pu Ban.
s1663: Ten. Crown prince Ying met with Qin king at Lin Jin, then went to Xian Yang and returned.
s1670: Six. Shu rebelled, Si Ma Cuo went to execute Shu guard Hui, pacified Shu. Solar eclipse, day darkened. Attacked Chu.
s1672: Eleven. Qin took our Rang. Struck Chu with Qin.
s1673: Twenty-five. Zhao attacked Zhong Shan. Hui empress died.
s1674: Twenty-eight. Qin, Han, Wei, Qi defeated our general Tang Mei at Chong Qiu.
s1676: Twenty-three. Struck Chu with Qin, sent Gong Zi to lead, greatly merited.
s1679: Seven. Chu Li Ji died. Struck Chu, beheaded thirty thousand. Wei Ran became chancellor.
s1683: Twenty-nine. Qin took our Xiang Cheng, killed Jing Que.
s1685: Twenty-four. Qin sent Jing Yang Jun to come as hostage.
s1688: Eight. Chu king came, then detained him.
s1689: Twenty. Met with Qi king at Han.
s1690: Thirteen. Qi, Wei kings came. Established Jiu as crown prince.
s1692: Thirty. King entered Qin. Qin took our eight cities.
s1694: Twenty-five. Jing Yang Jun again returned to Qin. Xue Wen entered chancellor Qin.
s1698: Twenty-one. Struck Qin with Qi, Han at Han Gu. River, Wei cut off one day.
s1699: Fourteen. Struck Qin with Qi, Wei.
s1700: Zhao Hui Wen Wang first year. Made Gong Zi Sheng chancellor, enfeoffed Ping Yuan Jun.
s1701: Chu Qing Xiang Wang first year. Qin took our sixteen cities
s1703: Twenty-six. Struck Qin with Wei, Han. Meng Chang Jun returned chancellor Qi.
s1706: Ten. Chu Huai Wang fled to Zhao, Zhao did not let in.
s1709: Two. Chu Huai Wang fled came, did not let in.
s1715: Eleven. Comet appeared. Again sealed Feng Ling with Wei.
s1717: Sixteen. (Struck Qin with Qi Wei) Qin made peace with us at Wu Sui.
s1719: Three. Huai Wang died in Qin, came back for burial.
s1724: Twelve. Lou Huan dismissed. Rang Hou Wei Ran became chancellor.
s1725: Wei Zhao Wang first year. Qin Wei Cuo came struck our Xiang.
s1726: Han Xi Wang Jiu first year
s1727: Four. Besieged killed Zhu Fu. Extinguished Zhong Shan with Qi, Yan.
s1728: Four. Lu Wen Gong first year.
s1730: Twenty-nine. Assisted Zhao extinguish Zhong Shan.
s1733: Thirteen. Ren Bi became Han Zhong governor.
s1734: Two. Fought with Qin, we unfavorable.
s1739: Thirty. Tian Jia kidnapped king, chancellor Xue Wen fled.
s1742: Fourteen. Bai Qi struck Yi Que, beheaded two hundred forty thousand.
